sentence.Network_en: Flammulina also has the same effect on tumor inhibition.
sentence.Network_cn: 金针菇也具有同样的功效,对肿瘤有抑制作用.

sentence.Network_en: As a resource both of medicine and food, flammulina velutipes has vast development future.
sentence.Network_cn: 金针菇是一种药食兼用的保健食品原料, 具有广阔的开发前景.

sentence.Network_en: This article discussed the optimization of vacuum freeze - drying and succade process of flammulina velutipes.
sentence.Network_cn: 讨论了新鲜金针菇的不同预处理方法及其真空 冷冻干燥 和蜜饯加工条件的优化.
